definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: cut, (divide,) determine (so Targum Syr., in both mngs.; BH usu. divide, † Jb Est decree);—

definitions.title: Pe
definitions.body: . Pt. act. as subst., pl. abs. [[גָּֽזְרִין]] determiners (of fate; astrologers or soothsayers) Da 2:27, Da 5:11; emph. [[גָּֽזְרַיׇּא]] Da 4:4, Da 5:7 (cf. Dr.; Ar. jz=0r RS:JPhil. xiii (1885), 781).

definitions.title: Hithpe.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[הִתְגְּזֶרֶת]] Da 2:34 a stone was cut out, so ´[[אִתְג]]: (K:§ § 23, 1; 30, 2) v:Da 2:45 (c. [[מִן]] of source).
